segments.text: I made a reservation earlier this week , but I have to cancel it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , sir . Just tell me your name , phone number , and date of reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! I'm Rudy Randolph , 818-555-1234 , and my reservation was for April 9 to 15 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , sir , let me hit the delete button , and your reservation will be cancelled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was nice and fast . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
